label: A19B10_hP58_175_e2j2kl_djl-001
title: Na$_{4}$Ge$_{13}$ Structure
comments: There are a large number of vacancies in this structure leading to the composition Na$_{4}$Ge$_{13}$: \begin{itemize} \item The Ge-I (2e) site is only occupied 25\% of the time. \item The Na-II (6j) site has 50\% occupation, so that only one of each sodium doublet is occupied. \item The Ge-VI (12l) site has 12.5\% occupation. \item The Ni-III (12) site has 25\% occupation. \end{itemize}
